name: International Conference on Public Health & Epidemiology
content: The International Conference on Public Health and Epidemiology (Public Health & Epidemiology 2024) is an important opportunity for professionals and enthusiasts dedicated to improving global health. The conference provided unprecedented insight into the frontiers of epidemiologic research, public health policy, health care, and community health interventions, and provided a critical test of interdisciplinary collaboration. Public Health & Epidemiology 2024 offers participants an immersive experience that facilitates contact with famous personalities, discovers the latest techniques and initiates a constructive dialogue. This event is intended for those who want to expand their professional circles, discover new models and help improve healthcare practices for global improvement. Full papers and abstracts are cordially invited. Rest assured, each submission will be carefully evaluated through a rigorous double-blind peer review process. We cordially invite all participants, from experienced epidemiologists to public health students, to witness this glorious moment. Don't miss this opportunity to impact the future of health. feel free to contact us for any further assistance/queries, Thanks & Regards Name: Jessica Jones | Project Manager Email: contact@frigateconferences.com Phone: +44-208 095 0177
